title: Whatâ€™s the Big Deal?: Why God Cares About Sex
description: Did you know that God created sex? If He created it, it is a good thing. Here is a book that your parents will read with you, or discuss with you as you read it on your own. They'll answer any questions you might have and help you understand what a beautiful and exciting gift from God your sexuality is meant to be.
author: Stanton L. Jones
